column3: As discussed in Note 1, the Company began consolidating Mexico on August 30, 2010.
Includes a $6, $49, and $32 increase to merchandise costs for a LIFO inventory adjustment for the second, third and fourth quarters, respectively. (See note 1—Merchandise Inventories).
Includes a $22 charge related to a change in employee benefits whereby certain unused time off will now be paid annually to our employees.

NET INCOME PER COMMON SHARE ATTRIBUTABLE TO COSTCO:

[1] As discussed in Note 1, the Company began consolidating Mexico on August 30, 2010. [2] Includes a $6, $49, and $32 increase to merchandise costs for a LIFO inventory adjustment for the second, third and fourth quarters, respectively. (See note 1—Merchandise Inventories). [3] Includes a $22 charge related to a change in employee benefits whereby certain unused time off will now be paid annually to our employees.
